Literature.Title: Structural and functional analysis of EntV reveals a 12 amino acid fragment protective against fungal infections.

Sequence Information.Comments: Discovery: This sequence corresponds to alpha7 in the crystal structure. Antifungal assays revealed its activity, whereas fragments from other helical regions were inactive.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (80%) toEntV 20merA: 25%, L=I=V=G=Q: 13%.Activity: active against C. albicans based on the survival of the infected animal model:Caenorhabditis elegans. Also effective against C. auris and C. neoformans.
